ygData.subject: RE: Charisma, Faction, and Merchant Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Buying jewels, at 119 charisma my jeweler both gets and pays the exact same as 129 charisma (The highest she can make so far) I have not tried taking off
ygData.messageBody:
>There sure is... it's somewhere between 100 and 120 CHA that prices bottom
>out (I don't remember exactly where, it's been months since I tested it).
>My base CHA is 132 now, with my Crude Stein (CHA 147) prices are
>unchanged.
>In order to test this, check prices on expensive items like
>gems... raising
>charisma from 50 to 200 might not appreciably change the cost of
>muffins. =
>)

Buying jewels, at 119 charisma my jeweler both gets and pays the exact same
as 129
charisma (The highest she can make so far)

I have not tried taking off more charisma stuff and seeing how this affects

(Oh, this after casting Alliance. Most Freeport merchants are apprehensive
before
and amiable after that)
